FuncDef: The admin-user privilege level command configures a user as an administrator to log in to the device and sets the user level. The undo admin-user privilege level command cancels the default user level. By default, the user level is not specified.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a user level. A larger value indicates a higher user level. After logging in to the device, a user can run only the commands of the same level or lower levels.
The value is an integer that ranges from 0 to 3.

ExtraInfo: A device manages users and commands by privilege level to limit user access permissions. After a user logs in to a device, the user can only use commands at the user's privilege level or lower. The command privilege level ranges from 0 to 3, and the user privilege level ranges from 0 to 3. The mapping between user privilege levels and command privilege levels is as follows:
